name: Retrieve the Sales Opportunity Information for an invalid Customer

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000000000"

When I Retrieve the Sales Opportunity Information
| cifKey |
| 0100000930000000000 |
Then no Sales Opportunity Information should be returned
